html:
Hi there,

Absolutely love your service! 

Would be interested to see your views on kickstarter.com. Here's a sample from the Australian site at http://www.kickstarter.com/terms-of-use?country=AU:

"The Company reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms of Use by posting the updated terms on the Site. It is your responsibility to check the Terms of Use periodically for changes. Your continued use of the Service following the posting of any changes to the Terms of Use constitutes acceptance of those changes."

Not great, given the length of their terms. Who goes back and reads the terms a second time!

This is the first time I've made a submission. Please let me know if you require any further information.

Regards,

Peter Bentley


--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: http://www.kickstarter.com/terms-of-use?country=AU
text:
Hi there,

Absolutely love your service! 

Would be interested to see your views on kickstarter.com. Here's a sample from the Australian site at http://www.kickstarter.com/terms-of-use?country=AU:

"The Company reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms of Use by posting the updated terms on the Site. It is your responsibility to check the Terms of Use periodically for changes. Your continued use of the Service following the posting of any changes to the Terms of Use constitutes acceptance of those changes."

Not great, given the length of their terms. Who goes back and reads the terms a second time!

This is the first time I've made a submission. Please let me know if you require any further information.

Regards,

Peter Bentley


--
